content.raw: I think there might be additional bugs related to this that need fixing. For example, we have a tuple of strings stored in a global. Under Python 3 in lyse, these are coming out as a tuple of byte strings when pulled out of the dataframe. Is this the same problem? It’s not immediately obvious to me that correcting this would be easy either.
